content: Insert a little bit of musical whimsy to your household with the piano key organizer. You’ll never misplace your keys again when they’re hanging neatly from they piano keys mounted on your wall – to release them you simply hit the desired key and out drops the key.

Focus on what really matters when traveling abroad with the “How To Swear Around The World” instructional book. As experienced world travelers can vouch for, it’s not about what or who you know, it’s about how well you can insult someone’s mother in proper dialect.

Play your favorite drinking game wherever the day or night takes you with the mini beer pong table. This small and portable version allows you and your friends to flip a small ball onto the opposite side using a specialized wooden catapult.

Makeup is awesome, so why not embrace it by storing all your accessories inside the “contents: my face” cosmetic bag? The bag comes in a fun pink hue along with the comical message that tells the whole world that’s where your money maker is stored.

Ponder the fatal design flaws of this ominous battle station while you chop and mince away on the Death Star cutting board. This geeky kitchen accessory offers an ample room for prepping or serving, and is coated with a special stain and scratch proof surface.

Add a splash of color to your bedroom by lighting up a few rainbow color drip candles. Every time the candle is lit, the brightly colored wax on the inside is released and creates stunning abstract works of art as it drips along the outer edges of the candle.

Look fresh to death at the next Gamestop midnight launch party with 8-bit temporary tattoos on your pale and atrophied gamer arms. The tats allow you to style yourself with iconic art styles such as Pac-Man cherries, the 1-UP life counter, and the heart health bar.

Take your culinary game to the next level by using the tiny measuring spoons to cook like a legend such as your mom or grandma. Now when you see a recipe call for a “smidgen” of this or a “pinch” of that you’ll know exactly how much to add to your meal.

Enjoy the intoxicating aroma of delicious pastries wherever you put the cinnabon scented air freshner. Place it in the home or office and the delicious smell of a cinnamon bun will fill every nook and cranny of the room as you bask in the delightful scent.

Perfect your cannon balls, can openers, and belly flops by spending a day on the floating trampoline. The trampoline provides swimmers with up to fifteen feet of space to jump around in or use as a catapult to launch themselves into the water.

Keep all the reading material in your home organized just like they did in the olden days with the revolver bookend. This incredibly life-like revolver is styled after the antique revolvers made famous by the spaghetti westerns of the silver screen.

Be prepared for any type of situation that may arise with the multi-tool iPhone case. Apart from protecting your treasured iPhone, the case boasts various compartments throughout the edges that serve to house a plethora of small yet useful tools.

Save your own life in a possible choking scenario with the DIY Heimlich maneuver tool. Lightweight and easy to transport, the tool is designed to help you perform the Heimlich maneuver on yourself so you don’t accidentally choke to death while you’re dining alone.

Open up the world’s biggest box of Nerds and enjoy binge eating your favorite candy until your teeth are nothing more than cavity ridden stumps. This mammoth box of Nerds contains one and a half pounds of delicious strawberry and grape Nerds.

Keep your alcoholism on the down low by disguising your brew with the beer hiding soda can cover. These reusable covers wrap around your beer can so that you can keep the buzz going without anyone around you suspecting a thing, unless you’re a sloppy drunk.

Securely store your <del>porn</del> valuable data with help from the biometric fingerprint password lock. It connects to a USB port on your PC and utilizes the uniqueness of one’s fingertip to ensure unwanted guests can’t gain access to your <del>collection of porn</del> information.

The floating beverage caddy will ensure your glass stays chilled and refilled all day long without you having to get out of the pool. The caddy features a durable stain resistant material and comes with specialized cup holders in addition to a pitcher holder.

Keep your humble abode well lit all year year round with the weatherproof motion sensor light. The light installs in minutes, requires absolutely no wires or plugs, and is designed to protect the LED lights against the elements so they shine bright every night.

Protect your phone while complimenting its fresh to death speakers with the equalizer iPhone case. The case features a series of equalizer bars that react to audible sound to create some eye catching lighting effects that are sure to turn heads.

Throw out those silly costumes and pimp out your family pet with this safe to use animal hair spray. The hair spray will  give your animal the freshest paint job in the neighborhood, and unlike a physical costume, it will not cause him or her any physical discomfort.

Whether it’s family, friends, or even people you don’t like – shooting people is just plain fun. Celebrate this undeniable fact with the “I Shoot People” mug. It features a Pentax camera sketch – and is a great gift for any photographer with a morbid sense of humor.

Bring your love of bird watching to your living room window with the one way mirror bird feeder. This transparent feeder holds approximately one pound of bird seeds and lets you get up close and personal while the birds unknowingly feed.

Light up those hard to reach places with ease by sticking one of these magnetic flashlight mines. The flashlight’s cleverly built frame comes equipped with various small magnets placed all around it, so you can aim the light in just about any direction you need.

Give your glassware a real thorough cleaning with help from the magnetic spot scrubber. The scrubber’s innovative design allows you to get into those hard to reach places in order to get your glassware looking as new as the day you first bought it.

Show your appreciation for the expendable men in white with the “Support the Troops” decal. After putting in long hours on the job and receiving random force chokes from Vader, this decal will help show them that their hard work for the Empire isn’t going unnoticed.

Drenched and humiliated – that’s exactly what the opposition will feel like after a fierce game of extreme water tag. The vests adjust to fit all body types and features a water gauge sensor that releases a big and very wet explosion that goes off once an enemy has been fatally shot.

Use the Force to ensure all your meats are cooked to perfection by using these lightsaber BBQ tongs. These intergalactic tongs feature a lightsaber inspired handle that comes with a specially designed red sheath that masks the metallic BBQ tongs in true lightsaber fashion.

Create a world of sparkling icy fish with the goldfish ice cube mold. This mold lets you creates ice or candy that resemble Japanese koi — each scale and fin being more beautiful than the last. The realism means you can freak out your friends with goldfish in their drinks.

Lady luck won’t make you rich but with the shot glass roulette you can count on her to get you violently drunk. With sixteen full shot glasses at your disposal, it won’t matter whether what number or color you spin, the result is always the same – inebriation!

A few spritz of the envelope x-ray spray and you’ll be able to temporarily spy on your significant other’s mail without them ever finding out. Let your inner <del>psycho</del> spy reign free on all the mail that enters your home without anyone finding out – NSA style.

Dominate the battlefield as you assassinate lesser opponents with no mercy using the airsoft grenade launcher. This 6-round revolving grenade launcher will pummel the enemy with 40mm airsoft grenade shells that’ll have them screaming in fear for their mommy.

Up the ante without sacrificing a single chip next time you deal a game with the gold playing cards. This luxurious deck of cards – fit for King Midas himself – come coated with a custom gold paint job that is perfect for a adding a little class to game night.

Throw a legendary party with help from the professional DJ MIDI controller. This high-tech accessory comes built with all the tools, modes, pads, buttons, and switches to have you spinning like the best of them. Or just use a playlist on your iPod, no one will really notice.

Create a winter wonderland any day of the year with some help from the snow flurries machine. Whether you need to sprinkle a bit of holiday cheer or are just looking to cool down, just push one button and you’ll create hundreds of delightful snow flurries.

Construct your garden like a giant LEGO set by employing the modular blocks farm system. These easy to assemble blocks help you make your garden more accessible and simple to farm while providing a colorful and unique aesthetic you can customize.

The collapsible travel dog bowls are the premiere way to keep Spot fed and hydrated without making a mess when you’re on the road. These practical bowls feature water-resistant ripstop lining and come with a sturdy bag designed to hold up to 15 pounds of food.

The fabled tale of a star-crossed galaxy far, far away hath returneth with Shakespeare’s Empire Striketh Back. Your favorite intergalactic droids, villains, and brooding heroes return to battle for control of the encompassing galaxy while soliloquizing in iambic pentameter.

Shaking hands is an unfortunately risky part of human interaction – it can solidify relationships, but it can also pass along disgusting germs and bacteria. Stay safe with the only hand sanitizer on the market that protects against hands that possibly touched genitals only moments prior.

No one can escape the wrath of the undead, not even old Lighting. The zombie horse mask  comes with realistic faux fur, a half chewed off face revealing the blood drenched muscles, and is topped off with a not so healthy green complexion that will surely turn heads.

The undead have risen and they want a killer tan, not brains. The zombie chomper bikini comes covered with a bold zombie design guaranteed to turn heads from the moment you step out of the house. Zombification has never looked so sexy.

Let your imagination soar by taking imaginary missions to the red rock using the LEGO Mars curiosity rover. This intricate piece offers quite a challenge with over 295 pieces, including an articulated robotic arm and 6-wheel suspension custom made for the rough Martian terrain.

Upgrade your drink by sipping out of it using bamboo straws. These biodegradable straws measure just under 8″ and contain a fun novelty design that makes each straw appear like a short piece of bamboo there to brighten up the appearance of your drink.

Scare away the neighborhood kids from ever again wanting to step foot on your lawn with the devilish tree face. This custom tree mask features a level of detailing so intricate that it seems to blend in seamlessly when placed over the tree trunk.

Even after being bit by ravenous zombies, the game of cribbage refuses to die – it just morphs into the zombified playing cards. Each face card in the deck features gruesome art depicting the King, Queen, and Jack as eerily mindless zombies.

Rub a dub dub jump on the giant rubber duck pool float, just not in the tub. This over-sized rubber ducky inflates to a whopping 60″ x 48″ tall yellow duck that loves to be ridden around on hot days as you cool off at the local watering hole.

Give your feline friend the ultimate sleeping spot with this ultra plush cat burger pillow bed. This comfy pillow provides your small pet with a secluded and comfortable relaxation area that will easily rival the comfort of the stiff cardboard box that he loves so much.

Stay on the greens long after the sun sets when you play with the light up golf balls. These regulation size golf balls each come built with an impressive forty hour internal battery that lights up to a vibrant and clearly visible color. Your wife won’t thank us.

Stay frosty on the hottest of days with a delicious treat prepared by the electric snow cone maker. Now you’ll be able to enjoy this brain freezingly nostalgic treat from the comfort of home and at a fraction of the cost. Best of all, you can customize the flavor combinations!

Turn your pool into a challenging mini-golf hole with the floating putting green. You’ll be able to improve your handicap by placing a higher level of difficulty to your training through the floating island – a moving target that offers you a different shot every time.

Come to the Dark side – we have cookies! This geeky Star Wars themed Darth Vader cookie jar keeps your delicious cookies and snacks always within a Jedi’s reach, in a container that would please any galaxy dweller – even if they are Rebel scum!

Harness the spirit of overused internet memes to exponentially hate everything on this planet with this Grumpy Cat three moon shirt. The instant you put on this outlook changing t-shirt you’ll notice that everything starts to look awful, and grumpiness will soon follow.

Clean up the toy area when playtime is over by using the toy mat and storage bag. This ultra durable mat acts like an enormous play area while stretched out and features a durable nylon strap that allows you to easily lump the toys together into a single compact bag.

With the draft beer jelly beans you can enjoy the taste of an ice cold beer without having to deal with an awful hangover the next day. These gourmet jelly beans come flavored just like your favorite draft beers and are finished off with a nice golden coat.

While other dinky toys get stuck in mere grass, the R/C Jeep Wrangler trudges through the toughest conditions mother nature throws its way. This scaled down Jeep Wrangler brings all the fun of a real Jeep without requiring a driver’s license to operate it.

Enjoy a star-filled evening no matter what the conditions are like outside with the starry night lantern by your side. Even if light pollution and smog have taken over your night skies, this lantern can still project a beautiful starry night inside any room you want.

Let the squirrels in your backyard horse around while they eat from this disturbing horse head squirrel feeder. This hanging squirrel feeder makes it appear like the squirrel is wearing s small version of the horse mask while they munch away on some food.

Start your own real life Mario Kart race club when you and your fellow neckbeards get your hands on these driveable Super Mario Karts! Styled after Mario’s own racing kart, it features signature sounds effects from the game and jets through any course at a blistering 2.5 MPH.

titleEN: Filming Porn Do Not Disturb Sign
content: Send a bold message to unwanted guests using the “filming porn do not disturb” sign. The mere thought of accidentally seeing your unshapely body pumping away is enough to keep any friend, family member, or roommate from ever wanting to step foot into your room.

No matter how you look at things, if you’re drinking from the optimist pessimist wine glass it’s all good because chances are you’re piss ass drunk. This comical wine glass features a stemless design that allows for a more comfortable grip while you drink away.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Aquarium Kit
content: Give your fish’s aquarium the nightclub environment they’ve been begging for with the glow in the dark aquarium kit. The kit includes everything you need to transform that dull tank into a vibrant habitat that adds breathtaking lighting to any room.

Great Scott! – Now with the Marty McFly shirt you’ll be able to dress in the same timeless outfit as one of the most iconic time travelers. This officially licensed shirt features Marty’s signature red vest, jean shirt, and plaid undershirt – the ultimate time travelling outfit.

Become a world-renowned beer connoisseur with the pocket beer book by your side. From the cutting-edge brews of the U.S. to the timeless stout beers of Europe, this helpful book teaches you everything you need or want to know about your favorite liquid.

The hat brim clip-on light keeps you visible at night without giving you that dorky coal miner look that other head gear gives you. Powered by easily replaceable lithium batteries, this lightweight light source clips onto the hat brim to provide an adjustable high beam light.

Keep your Millennium Falcon running in tip-top shape with this extremely detailed owner’s workshop manual. Whether you’re looking to complete the Kessel Run in less than 12 parsecs, or just want to avoid issues with your hyperdrive motivator, you need this book.

Assert your dominance over every other backpack in the schoolyard by showing up with the fierce tiger head plush backpack. This majestic backpack is designed to look like an amazingly realistic 3D tiger head that you can rock in either a white or orange colors.

Take delight in Sparky’s soul crushing diet by serving up his dried up slop on the nasty dog food place mat. This comical mat is easy to clean, features perfectly bound edges, and offers a satirical design that serves as a great conversation starter with friends and family.

When plain notes fail to capture your boss’s attention, leave it to the WTF sticky notes to get the job done. These novelty sticky notes come with an eye catching “what the fuck” design imprinted on every page so your message is impossible to miss.

The adult wine sippy cup makes drinking your wine on the go so convenient you’ll be able to stay inebriated wherever the day takes you. The cup encases your wine glass in a protective layer that keeps it from spilling so not a single drop is wasted.

Take a break from your busy day and spend a little time getting to know the deliciously unusual strawberry Kit Kat bar. This delectable candy treats your taste buds to the classic taste you’ve grown to love then hits them with a blast of strawberry – simply heavenly.

Keep your precious beer safe from sticky fingers and cooler than a polar bear’s toe nails with the giant fist drink cozy. This monstrous cozy is like a hulk hand for alcoholics, it protects your ice cold beer while keeping your hands nice and dry.

Convert your backyard into an intellectually stimulating environment with the giant chess set. The giant nylon mat sprawls out over an area of nine square feet and immerses you into a thrilling game of life sized chess like you’ve never experienced before.

There’s no need to request permission from Houston when you’re looking to dock your drained phone on the astronaut smartphone mount. Now anytime you’re looking for a charge, simply place the phone on the astronaut’s thrusterpack.

Who says you can’t learn some interesting tidbits while you prepare a delicious meal? This novelty 2-1/2″ measuring cup displays standard measurements on one side, along with fun and interesting factoids on other side – such as how much salt is in the human body.

Elevate your orgasm with a contact high provided by the cannabis flavored condoms. These groovy condoms protect against unwanted diseases and come with a cannabis flavor so intoxicatingly good they’re nearly impossible to resist.

The magnetic dishwasher clean/dirt flip sign is the clever way to inform the other inhabitants of your home whether the dishes require cleaning or not. Much like in restaurants and diners, the sign politely informs you if the dishwasher is full or open for business.

Hop on the bandwagon of America’s hottest diet trend and start losing weight fast! Shedding pounds doesn’t need to involve hard work or exercise! This physician* approved kit comes with re-engineered utensils designed to cut down on food intake.

Take your gaming skills to the next level with the Razer Mamba wireless gaming mouse. With gaming-grade wireless technology, a 4G dual sensor system, multi-color lighting, and up to 200 inches per second / 50g acceleration – it’s the only mouse you’ll ever need.

Avoid accidents on the job site by making sure the work area is properly illuminated with the dual angle flashlight. Unlike regular flashlights, the dual angle light features two different light fixtures so that every nook and cranny is properly lit.

Protect your home furniture against your cat’s destructive nature without the need to inhumanely de-claw her with these soft cat claw covers. These non-surgical caps fit over your cat’s sharp nails – preventing her from attacking any guests or tearing up the couch.

Simplify your life by keeping your keys and cell phone attached to one another using this iPhone keychain attachment. This unique tool attaches in seconds and provides you with an easy way to <del>lose all your stuff at the same time</del> stay organized while you rush out of the house.

The Doctor has been around a long time – but with the Doctor Who Character Encyclopedia you’ll be able to study up on each and every character portrayed in the series. Each page is jam packed with a rich history of each character, along with high quality imagery.

Don’t even think about calling yourself a true chili pepper connoisseur until you’ve had a taste of some barrel aged sriracha. This potent sauce carries all the anus-burning power of regular sriracha, yet has a fruity and smoky flavor that sets it apart from the rest.

Make the dullest drink come to life by dropping a couple of hungry sharks made with the 3D shark ice mold. This unique novelty mold creates small and fearsome looking sharks that float right at the surface of the drink until it’s cooled down.

If you’re in a rush, the lay and go travel bag is just what you need to pick up and go at a moments notice. Once all your stuff is laid out on the open bag’s surface – or in its side pocket – you simply pull the double nylon cord and the bag quickly closes, it’s that easy.

Why waste your valuable quarters on bouncy balls when you can create them from the comfort of home with the bouncy ball creation kit. You’ll be able to make up to six custom bouncy balls with vibrant colors you won’t find anywhere else.

Making healthy and savory omelettes is a breeze with help from the goldfish egg yolk separator. This friendly fish loves to gulp up some yummy egg yolks and is always willing to lend a <del>hand</del> fin in the kitchen – one squeeze is all it takes.

The long exposure light stick will take your photography to the next level by creating some jaw-dropping visual effects. Simply set your camera to the long exposure setting, then walk through the frame with the light stick to create incredible abstract works of art.

Light up your patio or party environment without wasting electricity when using the solar lantern string lights. These colorful and eco-friendly lights will decorate your porch or patio during the day as they absorb energy to light up the night.

If you think plants don’t have feelings then you’ve never encountered a touch sensitive plant before. These bashful Mimosa Pudica plants lie still while left alone, but as soon as they feel your touch, the plant comes to life in beautifully mind-blowing ways.

Satisfy your hunger without increasing your pants or dress size with the barbecue sunflower seeds. These delectable treats come with a mouth-watering barbecue flavor baked right in – it’s the classic Jim Beam taste we all know and love.

With the solar powered lighter you’ll be able to light up a cigarette no matter how windy or wet the environment may be. Instead of relying on gas lighters, this nifty tool harnesses the power of the sun to light your smoke while its reflective surface doubles as a mirror.

Get the party started from the moment you serve the first drink with the LED ice cubes. These decorative and functional ice cubes cool your drink while simultaneously illuminating it from within. The vibrant lights make even the dullest cocktails look mind-blowing.

There’s something fishy about the shape of the mermaid tail glass cups – and we like it because it still gets us drunk! Each mermaid shaped shot glass holds about 100ml in the intricately designed mermaid tail resting within the borosilicate glass cup.

He shoots, and the 3D soccer ball lamp scores! – Unfortunately it’s crashed straight into the wall. The lamp’s intriguing design creates the illusion a soccer ball has been launched directly into the wall and looks great whether it is lit or not.

Keep every canister in your well stocked spice collection perfectly organized and out of sight with the drawer tray spice tray set. These sturdy plastic trays feature handles for easy lifting and neatly arrange all the spices so they’re visible and easily at hand.

Embrace the reality of your relationship with these Beauty and The Beast pillow cases. Fitting to her soft and graceful personality, her pillow case comes with a sublimely written ‘Beauty’ moniker to let her ‘Beast’ of a man know which side he belongs on.

Pump a little life and color into your doodles with these neon pencils. These super bright coloring pencils come encased in a sleek black frame designed to contrast the neon colors on the inside, and work great for creating day-glow masterpieces – or just for highlighting.

Create a storybook pathway in your garden or backyard with help from the cobblestone forming mold. This great DIY tool is great for all skill levels and easily makes 2′ x 2′ squares of cobblestone pathway in minutes so you can complete the path in a day or less!

From the mind of the world’s top covert agent, the Archer Espionage handbook teaches you all you need to know about kicking ass and living life in the danger zone. From women and weapons to style and cocktail recipes – you’ll be saving the world in no time.

Receive some much deserved recognition for your hard work with every sip from the best entry level employee mug. This novelty mug lets all the other miserable saps in the mail room and bullpen know who’s top dog when it comes to making coffee and answering the phones.
